text: The 1948 Navy Midshipmen football team represented the United States Naval Academy during the 1948 college football season. In their first season under head coach George Sauer, the Midshipmen compiled a 0–8–1 record and were outscored by their opponents by a combined score of 227 to 77. ==Schedule== ==References== Navy Category:Navy Midshipmen football seasons Category:College football winless seasons Navy Midshipmen football
title: 1948 Navy Midshipmen football team
